p: Among the B/Victoria-like viruses that were less common in the US and Europe, a significant proportion (80% in the US) had a deletion of six nucleotides in the HA gene. Such strains were first detected in the epidemic season of 2016–2017 [ 28]. These strains differ antigenically from the B/Brisbane/60/2008 vaccine strain, and therefore, a typical representative of the strains with the deletion, B/Colorado/06/2017-like virus, was included in the composition of the vaccine for the 2018–2019 season based on the recommendation of the WHO [ 29].
